summary: Water quality parameters are stable and within optimal ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and the selected plants.

insights.recommendation: Keep TDS levels between 300-400 ppm for optimal nutrient availability.
Maintain water temperature between 24-28°C for optimal fish growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.035 / 7.016 / 7.088 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 320.254 / 300.3 / 331.1 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 26.043 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
